entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
